member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.SubworldLibrary.Call(System.Object[])
member.summary:
Available commands:
"Register", Mod mod, string name, int width, int height, List{GenPass} tasks, Action load = null, Action unload = null, ModWorld modWorld = null, bool saveSubworld = false, bool disablePlayerSaving = false, bool saveModData = false, bool noWorldUpdate = true, UserInterface loadingUI = null, Func{UIState} loadingUIState = null, Func{UIState} votingUI = null, ushort votingDuration = 1800, Action onVotedFor = null
"Enter", string id
"Exit"
"IsActive", string id
"AnyActive", Mod mod
"DrawMenu", bool (optional)
"DrawUnderworldBackground", bool (optional)

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Name
member.summary: Returns the translation key for this subworld.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Current
member.summary: Returns the ID of the current subworld, or null if not in a subworld.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.width
member.summary: The subworld's width. Cannot exceed 8400.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.height
member.summary: The subworld's height. Cannot exceed 2400.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.tasks
member.summary: A list of the subworld's generation tasks.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Load
member.summary: Called after the subworld has generated or loaded from file.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Unload
member.summary: Called when exiting the subworld.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.modWorld
member.summary: Only the specified ModWorld can update inside the subworld. If set to null, any ModWorld can update. Default: null

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.saveSubworld
member.summary: Whether the subworld should save or not. Default: false

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.disablePlayerSaving
member.summary: Disables player saving while in the subworld. Default: false

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.saveModData
member.summary: Whether ModWorld data should save with the subworld or not. if modWorld is not set to null, only the specified ModWorld's data will save. Default: false

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.noWorldUpdate
member.summary: Completely disables vanilla world updating in the subworld. Default: true

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.loadingUI
member.summary: Change this to your own UserInterface if you want the subworld's custom UI to persist after the subworld loads/unloads. Default: Main.MenuUI

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.loadingUIState
member.summary: Change this if you want the subworld to have a custom loading/unloading UI, instead of the default (UIDefaultSubworldLoad).

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.votingUI
member.summary: Change this if you want the subworld to have a custom voting UI, instead of the default (UIDefaultVoting).

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.votingDuration
member.summary: How long voting to enter or leave the subworld lasts. Default: 1800 (30 seconds)

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.OnVotedFor
member.summary: Called on the server when the subworld is voted for. If overridden, it is no longer immediately entered. Useful for making something like a pre-enter animation.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Enter(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enters the subworld with the specified ID. If called client-side, the ID is passed on to the server. The voting process is skipped if noVote is set to true.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Enter``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enters the specified subworld. If called client-side, the subworld's ID is passed on to the server. The voting process is skipped if noVote is set to true.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.VoteFor(Terraria.UI.UIMouseEvent,Terraria.UI.UIElement)
member.summary: Casts a vote, and closes the UI. Use this if you're using a custom voting UI.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.VoteAgainst(Terraria.UI.UIMouseEvent,Terraria.UI.UIElement)
member.summary: Casts a vote, and closes the UI. Use this if you're using a custom voting UI.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.Exit(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Exits the current subworld. The voting process is skipped if noVote is set to true.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.IsActive(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the current subworld's ID matches the specified ID.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.IsActive``1
member.summary: Returns true if the specified subworld is currently active.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.AnyActive(Terraria.ModLoader.Mod)
member.summary: Returns true if the current subworld is from the specified mod.

member.name: M:SubworldLibrary.Subworld.AnyActive``1
member.summary: Returns true if the current subworld is from the specified mod.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.subworld
member.summary: Whether the current world is a subworld or not.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.currentSubworld
member.summary: The current subworld.

member.name: P:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.progress
member.summary: The generation progress of the current subworld, or null if there's no generation going on.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.drawUnderworldBackground
member.summary: Whether the Underworld background should draw or not.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.drawMenu
member.summary: Whether the main menu should draw or not.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.noReturn
member.summary: Whether the Save & Exit button should be visible or not.

member.name: F:SubworldLibrary.SLWorld.origin
member.summary: The location of the main world file.
